elements.title: Yacht design and engineering
elements.content:
As a team made by different personalities with specific roles and talents, Skyron is prepared and equipped to provide a complete project of a sailing or motor yacht, with innovative ideas and all required skills and technology and softwares, supported by creativity and initiative.
All design steps would be 100% covered:
- External and internal layout
- Structural arrangement and scantling (FEM)
- Executive DWGs production
- Hull and appendages hydrodynamics simulations (CFD)
- Yacht Stability and Dynamics
- Sailing propulsion and VPP
- Engine propulsion and engine room arrangement and design
- Onboard systems design
- Production planning and project management
